did.unittitle: Xavier University Academic Computing Task Force records
did.abstract: Documentation and the 1991 final report of the Xavier University Academic Computing Task Force (ACTF).

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University Academic Computing Task Force
bioghist.p: Early in the summer, 1990, Dr. Joan Connell, Academic Vice President of Xavier, established a task force to develop a long range plan for academic computing at Xavier. This task force, with the support of consultants from International Business Machines Corporation (IBM), was asked to develop a five-year plan for computing as it affects the curriculum, the classroom and research at Xavier University. In September, 1990, the initial planning meeting was held. The Task Force issued its final report in 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection helps to give perspective on the development of academic computing at Xavier University. The collection consists of initial committee formation documents, a draft report, and the final report.
